      class  AbstractGesture
      Implements the common functionality of a gesture (getters and GestureState update).

      Fields in it.polito.computervision.gestures with type parameters of type Gesture 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Collection<Gesture> GestureManager.gestures 
      Methods in it.polito.computervision.gestures with parameters of type Gesture 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void GestureManager.notifyGestureCompleted(java.util.Collection<HandData> hands, Gesture gesture)
      Notifies listeners that the gesture has completed (i.e. invokes GestureListener.onGestureCompleted(GestureData))
      private void GestureManager.notifyGestureInProgress(java.util.Collection<HandData> hands, Gesture gesture)
      Notifies listeners that the gesture is in progress (i.e. invokes GestureListener.onGestureInProgress(GestureData))
      private void GestureManager.notifyGestureStarted(java.util.Collection<HandData> hands, Gesture gesture)
      Notifies listeners that the gesture is started (i.e. invokes GestureListener.onGestureStarted(GestureData))
      private void GestureManager.notifyListeners(java.util.Collection<HandData> hands, Gesture gesture, GestureState oldState)
      Notifies listeners if necessary, based on the GestureState transition that occurred.
      void GestureManager.registerGesture(Gesture gesture)
      Registers a Gesture to be updated at each new frame
      void GestureManager.unregisterGesture(Gesture gesture)
      Unregisters the Gesture.
      Method parameters in it.polito.computervision.gestures with type arguments of type Gesture

      Registers a collection of Gestures
      void GestureManager.unregisterGestures(java.util.Collection<Gesture> gestures)
